ðŸ“– Summary: Story-flicks is a Python-based project that leverages AI large language models to generate high-definition story short videos. It takes a story theme as input and automatically creates a video complete with AI-generated images, story content, audio, and subtitles. The project supports multiple AI providers, offering flexibility in model selection.
